snippet.title: Aluna Rift - Teaser Trailer [ OLD ]
snippet.description:
Development footage for the upcoming Indie Game - Aluna Rift - a top down sci-fi space shooter.

Trailer music: "Fractionite" - Drake Stafford

- - - - - - -

Illuminate the void of space with epic weapons and delicious destruction as you hunt Colossal Bosses in your upgradable time-bending spacecraft.

Responsive controls, a suite of challenging enemies and the endless void of space to traverse via Rift-Warp-Technology.

- - - - - - -

* Single Player
* Co-operative Play
* Battle Modes
* Boss Hunting Standard mode
* Endless Survival Mode
* Weapon Upgrades
* Combine Upgrades to create insane weapon combos

- - - - - - -

* Ultra Wide Screen Support
* Mouse & Keyboard Support
* Gamepad Support
* Hiscores & Leaderboards
* Achievements

- - - - - - -

Aluna Rift is still a work in progress, the footage shown in this video may not necessarily represent final quality. 

www.alunarift.com 
https://twitter.com/AlunaRiftGame
